arts.ttl: Former Everton and Juventus striker Moise Kean rushed to hospital following head injury in Serie A clash
arts.sum: Former Everton and current Fiorentina striker Moise Kean collapses on the pitch as a result of a head injury during his side's match against Hellas Verona on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina's Kean collapses on pitch after head injury
arts.sum: Fiorentina striker Moise Kean collapses on the pitch and is taken to hospital after sustaining a head injury during a 1-0 defeat at Hellas Verona.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina's Kean in hospital after collapsing on pitch
arts.sum: Fiorentina striker Moise Kean collapses on the pitch and is taken to hospital after sustaining a head injury during a 1-0 defeat at Hellas Verona.

arts.ttl: Moise Kean hospitalised after head injury collapse
arts.sum: Fiorentina striker Moise Kean was taken to hospital on Sunday after collapsing with a head injury during his team's defeat against Hellas Verona.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Ex-Everton star Moise Kean rushed to hospital after collapsing on pitch in worrying scenes
arts.sum: Former Everton and Juventus striker Moise Keane fell to the ground following a collission before being taken away in an ambulance as Fiorentina took on Verona in Serie A

arts.ttl: Chelsea to face Copenhagen in Conference League last 16 and cannot face Fiorentina until the final
arts.sum: Chelsea was paired with Copenhagen in the round of 16 of the UEFA Conference League on Friday after a draw that also separated the heavily favored English club from Fiorentina in a different half of the bracket. Fiorentina has lost the past two Conference League finals, and was paired with Panathinaikos.
